title: Debugging Your Android Source Code With ADB
description:
Debugging your source code is a critical part of any application development process and Android is no exception.

A lot of people post comments or email me asking me to help them with their application that isnâ€™t working. The first thing I try to ask for are the log files. I do this because 90% of the time, the log files have an error message that tells us exactly what line the error is on.

The post Debugging Your Android Source Code With ADB appeared first on The Polyglot Developer.
